title: exponential_() samples infinity on GPU
body_html:
torch.Tensor(100000000).exponential_().max() usually gives around 19+-2
torch.Tensor(100000000).cuda().exponential_().max() usually gives inf

On GPU, about 3 out of 100 million samples is greater than 30. When it's greater than 30, it's always inf. I'm on 0.2 but I think I observed this in 0.1 also.
